title: Can you please fix the screen resolution(make the screen smaller)
body: My screen is small so whenever i try to move LOL to the middle the login button dissapears. can you fix the login screen so that the right side wont dissapear???{{champion:43}}

replies.body: Go to setting in the top right, and there is an option to change the resolution of the client so you can make it smaller.
